title: ticker bugs with Stop()
body:
by **sorosj**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. start and stop many tickers (see attached file)
2. check for skew in ticks
3. lots of big differences

What is the expected output?
(almost) exact ticks

What do you see instead?
big differences (some ticks are delivered up to 40 seconds late)

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
8g

Which operating system are you using?
linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
51c777dbccb9 release/release.2010-12-22

Please provide any additional information below.
using a ticker of small resolution (I use a 1 second timer) seems to fix (or mitigate)
the problem
Attachments: 1. tst.go (612 bytes)
